text:
The documentation for FileSet contains an unresolvable link in the description 
of the attribute followsymlinks:
http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/CoreTypes/symlink is missing/wrong.

Can you give me a pointer to further documentation for this attribute?
creator: schu@telenet-ag.de
gus.heck@olin.edu
text:
Ah this seems to be a case of a slight unclarity in the wording, and a missing #
on the href. There is some chance that this is my fault, as I provided the
original followsymlinks patch. Thus, I am attaching a small doc fix patch that
should clear this up. 

As for a pointer to the further documentation, I would direct your eyes to the
bold NOTE: below the table, which is where the link will henceforth take you.

creator: gus.heck@olin.edu
text:
Created attachment 4121
patch to docs to fix broken internal link
